page.title: 09Young Wives and Football
page.content: The Young Wives Club was formed in March l975 as a way of getting mum's with babies and tots together. We meet once a month at a members house.We start with coffee and biscuits and a chat, this is followed by a talk or demonstration. We have visited a pottery, cheese dairy and cider maker. Our December meeting is decorating the Christmas tree in Church followed by Mince Pies and Hot Punch. Long Sutton Football Club started in l966. There are about 45 people involed with the club. There are 3 teams. They wear a Black and Blue strip or a Red and Black. The Manager's wife washes all the kit. There are about 2O to 3O supporters for Long Sutton. The supporters are nice and cheer for Long Sutton, who have won 3O cups in 2O years.
